title: Brokeback Mountain
writer: Annie Proulx, Larry McMurtry, Diana Ossana
short_cast: Heath Ledger, Jake Gyllenhaal, Michelle Williams, Linda Cardellini, Anna Faris, Anne Hathaway, Randy Quaid, Graham Beckel, Scott Michael Campbell, David Harbour, Kate Mara
cast: Heath Ledger, Jake Gyllenhaal, Michelle Williams, Linda Cardellini, Anna Faris, Anne Hathaway, Randy Quaid, Graham Beckel, Scott Michael Campbell, David Harbour, Kate Mara
